20110114190559.000|20110114190600.000|CC1|>>> AND SEVERAL DEADLY WEATHER  
20110114190600.000|20110114190601.000|CC1|SYSTEMS AROUND THE WORLD COULD  
20110114190601.000|20110114190605.000|CC1|ALL BE LINKED TO EL NINO        
20110114190605.000|20110114190607.000|CC1|AND LA NINA.                    
20110114190607.000|20110114190608.000|CC1|MORE THAN 500 PEOPLE VERY KILLED
20110114190608.000|20110114190612.000|CC1|BY FLOODS AND MUD SLIDES        
20110114190612.000|20110114190614.000|CC1|TRIGGERED BY TORRENTIAL RAINS.  
20110114190614.000|20110114190617.000|CC1|MANY DIED AS THEY SLEPT IN THEIR
20110114190617.000|20110114190617.000|CC1|HOMES.                          
20110114190617.000|20110114190618.000|CC1|SURVIVORS USED THEIR BARE HANDS 
20110114190618.000|20110114190621.000|CC1|TO SEARCH FOR LOVED ONES.       
20110114190621.000|20110114190623.000|CC1|AND IN AUSTRALIA AT LEAST 26    
20110114190623.000|20110114190625.000|CC1|PEOPLE ARE DEAD AND MORE THAN 50
20110114190625.000|20110114190626.000|CC1|ARE STILL MISSING AFTER WEEKS OF
20110114190626.000|20110114190628.000|CC1|FLOOD FLG THE STATE OF          
20110114190628.000|20110114190630.000|CC1|QUEENSLAND.                     
20110114190630.000|20110114190631.000|CC1|FLOODWATERS ARE NOW RECEDING    
20110114190631.000|20110114190633.000|CC1|AFTER DESTROYING OR DAMAGING    
20110114190633.000|20110114190633.000|CC1|MORE THAN 30,000 HOMES AND      
20110114190633.000|20110114190638.000|CC1|BUSINESSES.                     
20110114190638.000|20110114190641.000|CC1|THE MASSIVE CLEANUP IS EXPECTED 
20110114190641.000|20110114190645.000|CC1|TO COST $15 BILLION.            
20110114190645.000|20110114190651.000|CC1|AND IN SRI LANKA FLOODING AND   
20110114190651.000|20110114190653.000|CC1|MUDSLIDES FROM DAYS OF RAIN HAVE
20110114190653.000|20110114190656.000|CC1|KILLED AT LEAST 27 PEOPLE.      
20110114190656.000|20110114190658.000|CC1|AND WITH MORE ON THE EFFECTS OF 
20110114190658.000|20110114190707.000|CC1|THE EL NINO OR LA NINA IT MAY BE
20110114190707.000|20110114190708.000|CC1|HAVING, THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR   
20110114190708.000|20110114190709.000|CC1|JOINING US JEFF.                
20110114190709.000|20110114190709.000|CC1|>> YOU'RE WELCOME.              
20110114190709.000|20110114190711.000|CC1|AS I MENTIONED THERE ARE SOME   
20110114190711.000|20110114190712.000|CC1|ARTICLES SAYING THAT THIS COULD 
20110114190712.000|20110114190717.000|CC1|BE THE EFFECT OF                
20110114190717.000|20110114190718.000|CC1|EL NINO/LA NINA.                
20110114190718.000|20110114190718.000|CC1|EXPLAIN THAT TO US.             
20110114190718.000|20110114190720.000|CC1|>> RIGHT NOW IN THE EASTERN     
20110114190720.000|20110114190721.000|CC1|PACIFIC, WE HAVE AN UNUSUALLY   
20110114190721.000|20110114190723.000|CC1|LARGE AREA OF COOL WATERS CALLED
20110114190723.000|20110114190725.000|CC1|LA NINA.                        
20110114190725.000|20110114190727.000|CC1|IT'S A NATIONAL PHENOMENON THAT 
20110114190727.000|20110114190729.000|CC1|OCCURS EVERY TWO TO SEVEN YEARS.
20110114190729.000|20110114190730.000|CC1|WHEN YOU HAVE COOL WATERS LIKE  
20110114190730.000|20110114190732.000|CC1|THIS OVER THE PACIFIC, BY THE   
20110114190732.000|20110114190736.000|CC1|COAST OF AUSTRALIA YOU HAVE VERY

20110114195731.000|20110114195731.000|CC1|      AND MAKES TOOTH ENAMEL

20110114195734.000|20110114195734.000|CC1|         GET DUAL-ACTION        
20110114195734.000|20110114195736.000|CC1|   LISTERINE® WHITENING® RINSE. 
20110114195736.000|20110114195736.000|CC1|         BUILDING WHITER,       
20110114195736.000|20110114195739.000|CC1|         STRONGER TEETH.        
20110114195739.000|20110114195740.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] If you've 
20110114195740.000|20110114195741.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20110114195741.000|20110114195745.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20110114195745.000|20110114195745.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20110114195745.000|20110114195746.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20110114195746.000|20110114195746.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20110114195746.000|20110114195749.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20110114195749.000|20110114195750.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110114195750.000|20110114195752.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110114195752.000|20110114195752.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110114195752.000|20110114195754.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110114195754.000|20110114195754.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110114195754.000|20110114195757.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110114195757.000|20110114195757.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110114195757.000|20110114195759.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110114195759.000|20110114195801.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110114195801.000|20110114195801.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110114195801.000|20110114195802.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110114195802.000|20110114195802.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110114195802.000|20110114195805.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110114195805.000|20110114195805.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110114195805.000|20110114195808.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110114195808.000|20110114195808.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110114195808.000|20110114195810.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110114195810.000|20110114195812.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20110114195812.000|20110114195812.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20110114195812.000|20110114195814.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20110114195814.000|20110114195815.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20110114195815.000|20110114195815.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20110114195815.000|20110114195818.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20110114195818.000|20110114195818.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20110114195818.000|20110114195819.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110114195819.000|20110114195821.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20110114195821.000|20110114195821.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20110114195821.000|20110114195823.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20110114195823.000|20110114195823.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20110114195823.000|20110114195826.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20110114195826.000|20110114195826.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110114195826.000|20110114195828.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110114195828.000|20110114195830.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110114195830.000|20110114195830.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110114195830.000|20110114195832.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110114195832.000|20110114195832.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110114195832.000|20110114195834.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110114195834.000|20110114195834.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110114195834.000|20110114195836.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110114195836.000|20110114195836.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20110114195836.000|20110114195838.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20110114195838.000|20110114195838.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20110114195838.000|20110114195840.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110114195840.000|20110114195840.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20110114195840.000|20110114195843.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20110114195843.000|20110114195844.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20110114195844.000|20110114195845.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20110114195845.000|20110114195845.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20110114195845.000|20110114195848.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,  
20110114195848.000|20110114195848.000|CC1|   reported sometimes less than 
20110114195848.000|20110114195851.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20110114195851.000|20110114195851.000|CC1|     Other rare but serious     
20110114195851.000|20110114195936.000|CC1|     side effects may occur.
